text: Ho, jasala'i dasa prapta humdaina, tyasale sahavasabhanda pahila nirantara du'i mahinasam'ma vrata basos ra jasala'i yasako pani samathrya chaina ta, tyasale sathi (gariba) parasritaharula'i bhojana gara'os. Yo yasakarana ho taki timi allaha ra usako rasulako ajnakari bana. Yi allahad'dhara nirdharita simaharu hun ra namanneharuko nimti kastadayaka yatana cha
